instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 2011 MBP 15" GPU, LVDS, other.... ???
threads.message:
Hey, so there is this 2011 MBP here for repairs with lines on the screen and green tinge to it as soon as it begins to boot. Tried another screen, same thing.

I'll open it and have a look but has anyone seen this kind of issue before with issues other than GPU or screen or cable? I have only worked on Airs and Pro Retinas

threads.title: 2011 MBP 15" GPU, LVDS, other.... ???
threads.message: Does it boot into the OS without issue? If no then it is a fucked GPU and you can take it to Apple for a FREE repair.
